page.title: 20DOMESDAY PROJECT IN HORTON
page.content: This section of the Domesday survey has been compiled,written and edited by the ten pupils of the Junior class of Horton School and their teacher.We were all rather worried at first that it might be too difficult for such a small number of young children but now that we have finished we feel that it was enjoyable and worth the effort that was put into it.We particuarly enjoyed the long walks, colouring maps,studying nature and collecting fossils,wild flowers and feathers.We feel we have learned more about the place where we live, improved our writing and drawing and now understand maps and our computer much better. Emma Bright,Sarah Bright,Emma Cordy, Duncan Cronin,Alexandra Dando,Julie Glastonbury,Kellyrose Glastonbury, Richard Hawker,Katherine Tily,James Wickett, D.G.Cooksley.
